Class EnquiryService

java.lang.Object
services.EnquiryService
public class EnquiryService extends Object
Service class for managing property enquiry operations. Provides functionality for creating, retrieving, editing, and responding to property enquiries. Enforces business rules regarding enquiry ownership and status transitions.

  • Method Details

    • getProjectEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getProjectEnquiries(Project project)
      Retrieves all enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to filter enquiries by
      Returns:
      list of enquiries associated with the given project

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant. Filters enquiries based on the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant whose enquiries to retrieve
      Returns:
      list of enquiries submitted by the applicant

    • createEnquiry

      public static void createEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Creates a new enquiry. Validates the enquiry object.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to create
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if enquiry is null

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String enquiryId, String newContent)
      Edits an existing enquiry's content. Validates that:
      • The enquiry exists
      • The applicant owns the enquiry
      • The enquiry hasn't been responded to
      • The new content is valid
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant editing the enquiry
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to edit
      newContent - the updated enquiry content
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String enquiryId)
      Deletes an existing enquiry. Validates that:
      • The enquiry exists
      • The applicant owns the enquiry
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant deleting the enquiry
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • replyToEnquiry

      public static boolean replyToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String response, String responderNRIC)
      Adds a response to an enquiry and marks it as responded. Validates that:
      • The enquiry exists
      • The response content is valid
      • The enquiry hasn't already been responded to
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to respond to
      response - the response content
      responderNRIC - the NRIC of the staff member responding
      Returns:
      true if response was successful, false otherwise
